EducInstSearchableProfile.name: EducInstSearchableProfile
EducInstSearchableProfile.description: Represents information about an educational institution aggregated from other objects for Criteria-Based Search and Filter.

AccountId.description: The institution's account related to the educational institution searchable profile.

Address.description: The address of the educational institution.

BusinessProfileId.description: The business profile related to the educational institution searchable profile.

City.description: The city where the educational institution is located.

Country.description: The country where the educational institution is located.

CountryCode.description: The country code of the country where the educational institution is located.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency related to theeducational institution searchable profile.

EducInstitutionOfferingId.description: The institution offering related to the educational institution searchable profile.

EducationalInstitutionFormat.description: The education format at the educational institution.

EducationalInstitutionImageUrl.description: The URL of the image for the educational institution.

EducationalInstitutionName.description: The name of the educational institution.

EducationalInstitutionType.description: Specifies the type of the educational institution.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy rating for the geocode of the educational institution. The accuracy rating contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude.

GradesOffered.description: The grades offered by the educational institution.

GradesOfferedSummary.description: The category of grades the educational institution offers.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Latitude.description: The latitude where the educational institution is located.

LearningAcademicLevel.description: Specifies the academic level offered by the educational institution.

LearningCategory.description: The learning category of the educational institution.

LearningFormat.description: The learning format of the educational institution.

LearningGrade.description: The learning grade of the educational institution.

LearningId.description: The learning record related to the educational institution searchable profile.

LearningImageUrl.description: The URL of the image for the learning record related to the educational institution.

LearningProgramId.description: The learning program related to the educational institution searchable profile.

LearningProgramName.description: The name of the learning program offered by the educational institution.

Longitude.description: The longitude where the educational institution is located.

Name.description: The autonumbered name of the educational institution searchable profile.

OwnerId.description: The user who is the owner of this record.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the educational institution.

ProviderId.description: The provider related to the educational institution searchable profile.

ProviderName.description: The name of the provider for the educational institution.

State.description: The state where the educational institution is located.

StateCode.description: The state code of the state where the educational institution is located.

Street.description: The street where the educational institution is located.

SupportProgramFormat.description: The format of the support program at the educational institution.

SupportProgramId.description: The support program related to the educational institution searchable profile.

SupportProgramImageUrl.description: The URL of the image for the educational institution's support program.

SupportProgramName.description: The name of the support program at the educational institution.
